lines.text: Man should live and let live, and without any interfering.
Even that poor squid was free once, Simon, eh? I study Coleopters because I love them.
Sure, but the squirming little creatures still end up under your microscope. Yeah, he's dead alright but at least I eat my squid. But I don't kill as a hobby like you do.
Good Lord, Simon; you make me feel like a murderer.
I'm not saying that, Mr. Fossati; but if you kill for killing's sake - you become a monster.
But, man isn't an insect, my dear Simon. We have centuries of civilization behind us, you know.
No, I don't know. I wasn't there.
